org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.tez.runtime

Class PartitionerDefinedVertexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tez.dag.api.VertexManagerPlugin
      • org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.tez.runtime.PartitionerDefinedVertexManager

  • public class PartitionerDefinedVertexManager
extends org.apache.tez.dag.api.VertexManagerPlugin
    VertexManagerPlugin used by sorting job of order by and skewed join. What is does is to set parallelism of the sorting vertex according to numParallelism specified by the predecessor vertex. The complex part is the PigOrderByEdgeManager, which specify how partition in the previous setting routes to the new vertex setting
